event.descr:
A user failed to authenticate to the POSIX su command
Attempting user (UID): %parm[user]% (%parm[uid]%)
Target user (UID): %parm[targetUser]% (%parm[targetUid]%)
TTY: %parm[tty]%
Host: %nodelabel%
Interface: %interface%
Message: %parm[syslogmessage]%
Process: %parm[process]%
PID: %parm[processid]%
event.logmsg: su failure for user %parm[user]% to user %parm[targetUser]% on %parm[tty]%
